EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Webinar Series: Stay on Top of Your Consulting Game
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good morning, {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}},
As an aspiring or current independent consultant, staying up-to-date and finding content that’s actually relevant to you can be tough. That’s why we’re pleased to share that MBO Partners has developed 30- and 60-minute webinar discussions on educational topics geared toward independent thinkers like you. These webinars will focus on exciting topics like –
• Going Solo: Are You Ready? • Calculating Your Bill Rate • Finding Your Next Contract • Starting Your 2nd Career in Consulting
I’d like to invite you to join us throughout 2012 as a registrant for our new Webinar series – getting helpful answers to questions from experts and other real-life professionals like you facing similar questions and challenges.
Sign me up - http://info.mbopartners.com/2012SeriesSignUp.html
The topic for this month is ‘How to Calculate Your Bill Rate: Expert Tips for Solopreneurs.’ It will be held on Friday, March 2nd at 12:30 PM, EST. Learn more and register by going here, http://info.mbopartners.com/Calculating-Bill-Rate.html.
Kind Regards,
{{lead.Lead Owner First Name:default=Steve}}
